subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Playing without the injured Carmelo Anthony again, the Knicks overcame a 41-point outing by Kyrie Irving and a wild final minute to stay undefeated at home this season.
snippet: Playing without the injured Carmelo Anthony again, the Knicks overcame a 41-point outing by Kyrie Irving and a wild final minute to stay undefeated at home this season.
